api_key.description: API key to use in order to authenticated against updown.io API.

custom_headers.description: The HTTP headers you want in requests.

disabled_locations.description: Disabled monitoring locations. It's a lsit of abbreviated location names.

enabled.description: Is the check enabled (true or false).

mute_until.description: Mute notifications until given time, accepts a time, 'recovery' or 'forever'.

published.description: Shall the status page be public (true or false).

string_match.description: Search for this string in the page.

url.description: The URL you want to monitor.
The URL of the webhook you want to trigger on updown events.

ipv4.description: Ipv4 addresses list of the nodes.

ipv6.description: Ipv6 addresses list or the nodes.

block.description: `updown_nodes` data source can be used to retrieve the IP addresses of their servers.
